ygData.messageBody:
At 11:42 AM 8/7/99 -0400, you wrote:
>From: "Michael Meadows" <meadows@...>
>
>The easiest and most sensible fix is to remove the z-axis code, and fix
>spell casters so they can't cast any spells while levitating. So they can
>either float away from danger, or get down on the ground and attack, but
>they can't have it both ways.
>
> Paralto of Povar

What about archers? What about weapon effects ("procing") What about PvP
duels? Three more issues that would need to be addressed simultaneously.
If I were king....
You would only be able to engage in melee combat while levitating (no
balance for archery, too much concentration for spellcasting), other
spell-effect things (are there wands of fireballs yet?) would have to be
addressed then. Simultaneous with that, I would remove the ability to cast
levitate on anyone not in your group. If I were king, that is.



Talies the Wanderer
